Hello Blog

Hello!

Welcome, I'm Andy, a Software Engineer in York, I'm a Christian, and I'm interested in embedded systems and web development.

Who am I?

I work for Rapita Systems predominantly in Ada and C programming.

I studied Computer with Embedded Systems Engineering MEng at the University of York, and whilst I was there was very involved at URY, the University's student radio station. In my spare time, I enjoy cycling, rock climbing, making websites and writing code.

As well as all that, I am a live sound engineer & non-professional music producer. I also am the producer for the National Award Winning Biscuit News which is now a ridiculous podcast.

I am a general technophile, I like gadgets and computery things.

You can find out more about me from various profiles around the web:

  • AJDurant on GitHub
  • Andrew Durant on LinkedIn
  • @andydurant on Twitter
